name: Venineth Beta
description:
Venineth is a single-player game focusing on unraveling the mysteries of ancient alien technology somewhere in the universe via exploration, platforming, and puzzle-solving, in a dangerous, distant worlds.

Features
  • Over 20 places to explore, including: planets, moons, gas giants, orbital stations, asteroids, and alien megastructures
  • Semi-open world planetary levels with difficult to find tracks amongst a labyrinth of rocks, canyons, toxic lakes, and rivers of lava
  • Linear orbital levels, with challenging platforming sections containing gravity fields, force fields, and zero-g areas
  • Physics-based puzzles with varied mechanics
  • Original space-ambient music soundtrack by EchoRay
Wishlist Venineth on Steam:

Beta Build v0.0424
  • first 2 worlds + HUB
  • 8 secrets to find
  • 20 - 40 minutes of gameplay
  • full gamepad support (tested on X360/XONE controller)
  • autosaves

We know that game UI needs corrections, so don't be so harsh please ;)

Controls

Keyboard + mouse

  • WSAD / Arrows = movement / menu navigation
  • Enter = apply
  • Mouse = camera rotation
  • Space = jump
  • R = reset to last chceckpoint
  • ESC / Backspace = pause menu

Gamepad (recommended)

  • Left Stick / D-Pad = movement / menu navigation
  • A = apply / jump
  • Right Stick = camera rotation
  • Y = reset to last checkpoint
  • Back / B = pause menu

See you in 4019!
